Interface DateInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyDate

    public interface DateInterface
    Interface for Date objects to be used by the Year3000 driver program.

    • Method Summary

      moves the date forward by exactly one day

      Moves the date backword by exactly one day; make this empty {} unless you do the extra credit.

    • Method Detail

      • getDay

        int getDay()
        Returns:
        the day of the month (1-31)

        Returns:

        Returns:
        the month of the year (1-12)

        Returns:

       int d,
       int y,
       int dow)
        sets the date
        Parameters:
        m - the month of the year (1-12)
        d - the day of the mongth (1-31)
        y - the year (four digits)
        dow - the day of the week (0-6)

        void tomorrow()
        moves the date forward by exactly one day

        java.lang.String toString()

        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
